Title: Monster Reunion
Writer: Raven Molisee, Paul Villeco, Matt Burnett (story editor), Matt Burnett (story), Ben Levin (story editor), Ben Levin (story), Rebecca Sugar (story), Ian Jones-Quartey (story), Kat Morris (story)
Actors: Zach Callison, Dee Bradley Baker, Michaela Dietz, Estelle
Plot: Steven learns more about himself, an old friend and the dark powers of the gem matriarchy.
